For some reason this file crashes every player I try to open it with. And it even crashes explorer if I try to open the folder containing it. Strange, never had this kind of problem.
i have some strange problems
I have no audio when playing the file on any player.. video quality is amazing though..

I also have a problem with the Audio not working on any player. I inspected the file and it definitely has audio but for some strange reason it doesnt play? Although the videos looks awesome, can somone help me with this problem please?

My audio didn't work when playing on Windows media player, so I played it on Nero Kwik Media.  Video and audio worked fine.  I don't know about other players, but maybe the people who are having trouble with audio can just watch on another media player.
thanxx 4 the episode :D

To paladyn44, JordieB18, gigabot183 and meetmyburrito,

Just. Use. VLC media player.

It will solve every issue you have. Always. It is the best media player. Use it always. ALWAYS.

You're welcome.
A little more than 5 minutes, but perfect. Thank you.
